
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VNtscGenerator.cpp
          VNtscGenerator.h
          VNtscGenerator__Syms.cpp
          VNtscGenerator__Syms.h
          VNtscGenerator__Trace.cpp
          VNtscGenerator__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS NtscGenerator.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/NtscGenerator.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VNtscGenerator STATIC
    VNtscGenerator.cpp
    VNtscGenerator__Syms.cpp
    VNtscGenerator__Trace.cpp
    VNtscGenerator__Trace__Slow.cpp
    NtscGenerator.v
)

target_compile_options(VNtscGenerator PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VNtscGenerator PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VNtscGenerator verilated)
